General.Name: CSSC Steel Structure Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: CSSC Science& Technology Co., Ltd operates in the civil engineering construction industry primarily in China. It undertakes housing construction and bidding projects; survey, consulting, design, and supervision projects; and contracting bidding projects. The company is involved in the exporting of equipment and materials; provision of engineering consultation, feasibility study, and project evaluation; export and consignment sales; manufacture of hoisting machinery; import and export of goods and technology; sale of mechanical and electrical equipment; technical labor export; technical development, consultation, transfer, and services in the field of ship decoration engineering. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.
